lines.value: hobyo (, ) is an auncient harbor ceety in the mudug region o somalie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo literally means here water an the plentiful fresh watter tae be haed frae the wells in an aroond the toun a rarity in this pairt o the warld haes been the drivin force ahint hobyo's auncient status as a favorite port o caw for sailors
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo's history began as a place for sailors an caravans tae get fresh watter sicweys its name
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it ae became a toun o importance when the muslim pilgrims departin for mecca on thair hajj an the sea captains who wad tak them thare began favorin the toun as a pynt o departure acause o its fresh watter
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this sea an land traffeck suin led tae hobyo becomin somethin o a commercial center
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: opone the ance great entrepot which haed been the centre o commerce began its decline intae obscurity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the increasin importance an rapid dounset o mair soothrenlie ceeties sic as mogadishu further boostit the prosperity o hobyo as mair an mair ships made thair wey doun the somali coast an stopped in hobyo tae tred an replenish thair watter
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo wis the commercial centre o the ajuuraan state based in qalafo locatit in the present day ogaden
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: commercial goods harvestit alang the shabelle river especially aroond the agricultural centers o harardheere an el dheer wur brought tae hobyo for tred
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ajuuraan rulers collectit thair tribute frae the toun in the form o sorghum durra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo's ajuuraan rulers wur allies wi an occasionally owerlords o the mogadishu sultanate an tred atween hobyo an the benadir coast flourished for some time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sae vital wis hobyo tae the prosperity o the ajuuraan state that when the hiraab a lineage o closely relatit hawiye clans successfully revoltit against the ajuuraan an establisht an independent hiraab imamate which includit hobyo the ajuran's might dwindled rapidly
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this wis no the ae fragmentation o the ajuuraan state as the warsengali an aa broke away tae form thair awn sultanate in the north an the majerteen sultanate shook off centuries o ajuuraan hegemony
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ajuuraan remained in thair pouer base in qalafo but wur a shadow o thair umwhile selves
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a majerteen pretender tae the throne yusuf ali keenadid who haed been exiled tae arabia bi sultan boqor isman mahamud efter a failed coup d'etat returned frae arabie an invadit hobyo wi an airmy o mercenaries frae hadramut in 1878
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter conquerin hobyo frae the hiraab imamate he established himself as the sultan o hobyo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the hiraab imam haed acome too involved in the politics an conflicts wi ither hawiye clans wi the sultan o oman an wi the portuguese which haed drawn his attention sooth tae mogadishu an little resistance tae yusuf ali keenadid coud be mustered
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the rest o the hiraab imamate wis rapidly snapt up bi the italians tho the imam remained a pouerful force due tae his influence ower hiraab communities an plays an important pairt in politics right up tae the present day
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the fowk in an aroond hobyo grew mainly sorghum an beans as thair staple foods supplementin this wi herds o caumels cattle gaits an sheep
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: livestock hides an skin aromatic woods an raisins wur the primary exports while rice ither fuidstuffs an claes wur importit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: merchants luikin for exotic goods came tae hobyo tae buy textiles precious metals an pairls
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi the defeat o the sultanate o hobyo at the haunds o fascist italy 50 years later hobyo wis annexed intae italian east africae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter its annexation bi italy hobyo's lifeblood the tred routes that haed passed throu the toun for 10 centuries moved permanently sooth tae mogadishu
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun never recovered
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the majority o the populace who haed been involved in said mercantile activities follaet the tred doun tae mogadishu establishin the link atween thir ceeties that haes existit tae this day an the toun haes played nae major role in ony o the ensuin conflicts wi ethiopia aither as pairt o italian east africae or independent somalie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the governments o baith hae actively encouraged the toun's decline in fact as thay increasingly centralized hobyo's historical roles athin mogadishu
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo is a shadow o its umwhile importance an wealth
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo wis captured bi the islamic court union icu on august 16 2006 efter several days negotiation wi leadin figures in the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: icu armed pickup trucks technicals surroondit the toun several days afore an sent in delegates tae negotiate hobyo's surrender
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety wis apparently taken athoot firin a shot as the unnamed warlord o hobyo haed fled days earlier upon hearin o the icu's approach
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the icu haed taken the toun in an unsuccessful attempt tae end piracy on the benadir coast an hobyo wis the last remainin major port sooth o puntland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo chose tae jyne the newly formed galmudug state as an alternative tae annexation bi the icu creautin a buffer atween the icu an puntland but wi the rise in conflict atween galmudug an the icu icu forces teuk the ceety again on november 1
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hobyo's present status is clear as the clans saad is pouerful aroond hobyo controllin hobyo broke away frae the icu juist afore the ethiopian offensive tae the coast
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: incollaboration dila militia destroyed the work o years an years carelesslie an cruellie at a time the ceelbardale community wis experiencin an ethnic cleansin an driven oot o their farms an hames bi siad barre's genocidal regime

lines.value: when at last the community came back an defeatit siad barre they startit rebuildin homes schools an recultivatin burned lands the unresolved inferno torn the community again

lines.value: a calculatit an continuous dahir riyale kahin driven dila militia ambushes an attacks

lines.value: the unitit kinrick o great breetain an northren ireland (), commonly kent as the unitit kinrick (; uk or breetain (), is a sovereign kintra in wastren europe

lines.value: lyin aff the north wastren coast o the european mainland the uk includes the iland o great breetain the north eastren pairt o the island o ireland an mony smawer islands

lines.value: northren ireland is the anly pairt o the unitit kinrick that shares a laund mairch wi anither sovereign statethe republic o ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: apairt frae this laund mairch the uk is surroondit bi the atlantic ocean wi the north sea tae its east the inglis channel tae its sooth an the celtic sea tae its sooth sooth wast giein it the 12t-langest coastline in the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the erse sea lies atween great breetain an ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi an aurie o the uk is the 78t-lairgest sovereign state in the warld an the 11t-lairgest in europe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is an aa the 21st-maist populous kintra wi an estimatit 65.5 million indwallers

lines.value: thegither this maks it the fowert maist densely populatit kintra in the european union eu
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the uk is a constitutional monarchy wi a pairliamentar democracy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the monarch is queen elizabeth ii that haes ringed syne 6 februar 1952 makkin her the langest servin current heid o state

lines.value: the uk's caipital an lairgest ceety is lunnon a global ceety an financial centre wi an urban aurie population o 10.3 million the fowert lairgest in europe an seicont lairgest in the european union

lines.value: ither major urban auries in the uk include the conurbations centred on birmingham leeds glesga liverpuil an manchester

lines.value: the uk consists o fower kintras ingland scotland wales an northren ireland

lines.value: aw but ingland hae devolved admeenistrations ilk wi varyin pouers based in thair caipitals edinburgh cairdiff an belfast respectively

lines.value: the nearbi isle o man bailiwick o guernsey an bailiwick o jersey are nae pairt o the uk bein croun dependencies wit the breetish govrenment responsible for defence an internaitional representation

lines.value: prior tae the creaution o the uk wales haed been conquered an annexed bi the kinrick o ingland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this meant that the unitit kinrick creautit in 1707 bi the treaty o union atween ingland an scotland encompassed aw o great breetain

lines.value: the kinrick o ireland merged wi this state in 1801 tae form the unitit kinrick o great breetain an ireland

lines.value: five saxts o ireland secedit frae the uk in 1922 leavin the present formulation o the unitit kinrick o great breetain and northren ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare are fowerteen breetish owerseas territories the remnants o the breetish empire that at its hicht in the 1920s encompassed awmaist a quarter o the warld's land mass an wis the lairgest empire in history
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: breetish influence can be observed in the leid cultur an legal seestems o mony o its umwhile colonies
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the uk is a developed kintra an haes the warld's saxt lairgest economy bi nominal gdp an ninth lairgest economy bi purchasin pouer parity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes a heich income economy an haes a verra heich human development index rankin 16t in the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis the first industrialised kintra an the warld's foremaist pouer in the 19t an early 20t centuries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the uk remeens a great pouer wi conseederable economic cultural militar scienteefic an poleetical influence internaitionally
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is a recognised nuclear wappens state an is seivent in militar expenditur in the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes been a permanent member o the unitit naitions security cooncil syne its first session in 1946
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes been a leadin member state o the eu an its predecessor the european economic commonty eec syne 1973 houiver on 23 juin 2016 a non bindin referendum on the uk's membership o the eu resultit wi 51.9% o uk voters favourin a leave an the kintra's prospective exit frae the eu is bein negotiatit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the uk is an aa a member o the commonweel o naitions the cooncil o europe the g7 finance meenisters the g7 forum the g20 nato the organisation for economic co operation an development oecd an the warld trade organisation wto
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: settlement bi anatomically modren humans o whit wis tae acome the unitit kinrick occurred in waves beginnin bi aboot 30000 years agae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bi the end o the region's prehistoric period the population is thocht tae hae belanged in the main tae a cultur termed insular celtic comprisin brythonic breetain an gaelic ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the roman conquest beginnin in 43 ad an the 400-year rule o soothren breetain wis follaed bi an invasion bi germanic anglo saxon settlers reducin the brythonic area mainly tae whit wis tae acome wales cornwall an the historic kinrick o strathclyde
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: maist o the region settled bi the anglo saxons becam unifee'd as the kinrick o ingland in the 10t century
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: meanwhile gaelic speakers in north wast britain wi connections tae the north east o ireland an tradeetionally supposed tae hae migratit frae thare in the 5t century unitit wi the picts tae creaut the kinrick o scotland in the 9t century
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the early modren period saw releegious conflict resultin frae the reformation an the introduction o protestant state kirks in ilk kintra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wales wis fully incorporatit intae the kinrick o ingland an ireland wis constitutit as a kinrick in personal union wi the inglis croun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1603 elizabeth i o ingland deed an jamie the saxt o scotland becam james the first o ingland an aa

lines.value: tha acts o union 1707 makkit tha kinrick o great breetain an tha scots pairlament wis unitit wi tha inglis pairlament in lunnon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the mid 17t century aw three kinricks war involved in a series o connectit wars includin the inglis ceevil war that led tae the temporar owerthraw o the monarchy an the establishment o the short leeved unitar republic o the commonweel o ingland scotland an ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho the monarchy wis restored the interregnum ensured alang wi the glorious revolution o 1688 an the subsequent bill of rights 1689 an the claim of right act 1689 that unlik muckle o the rest o europe ryal absolutism wad nae prevail an a professed catholic coud niver accede tae the thrane
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the breetish constitution wad develop on the basis o constitutional monarchy an the pairlamentar seestem
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tho previous attempts at unitin the twa kinricks within great breetain in 1606 1667 an 1689 haed pruived unsuccessfu the attempt initiatit in 1705 led tae the treaty o union o 1706 bein agreed an ratified bi baith pairlaments
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on 1 mey 1707 the unitit kinrick o great breetain came intae bein the result o acts o union bein passed bi the pairlaments o ingland an scotland tae ratify the 1706 treaty o union an sae unite the twa kinricks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the 18t century cabinet govrenment developed unner robert walpole in practice the first prime meenister 1721-1742

lines.value: the jacobites war feenally defeatit at the battle o culloden in 1746 efter that the scots hielanders war brutally suppressed

lines.value: breetish imperial ambition turned taewart asie pairteecularly tae indie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter the defeat o fraunce at the end o the revolutionary an napoleonic wars 1792-1815 great breetain emerged as the principal naval an imperial pouer o the 19t century wi lunnon the lairgest ceety in the warld frae aboot 1830
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: unchallenged at sea breetish dominance wis later descrived as pax britannica breetish peace a period o relative peace amang the great pouers 1815-1914 in that the breetish empire becam the global hegemon an adoptit the role o global polisman
lines.name: Scots

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the heich fatalities o trench warfare caused the loss o muckle o a generation o men wi lastin social effects in the naition an a great disruption in the social order

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the honda s600 is an automobile manufactured bi honda
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis launched in mairch 1964
lines.name: Scots

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ingine produced 57 hp 43 kw an haed a tap speed o 90 mph 140 km h

lines.value: perranarworthal is a ceevil pairish an veelage in cornwall ingland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the veelage is situatit approximately fower miles 6.5 km northwast o falmouth an five miles 8 km soothwast o truro
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: perran wharf is the aurie o the parish beside the river kennall a tributary o restronguet creek whaur thare wur wharves an a quay
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ither major dounset in the parish is perranwell
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: perranarworthal parish is bordered on the north bi kea parish on the east bi restronguet creek an mylor parish on the sooth bi st gluvias an stithians parishes an on the wast bi gwennap parish
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the name derives frae the manor o arworthal which haes haed a nummer o spellings in the past includin hareworthal 1187 arwoethel an arwythel

lines.value: bi the 18t century twa names appear on maps perran arworthal meanin st piran's bi the creek or estuary

lines.value: william penaluna describit the dounset in 1838

lines.value: it wis the hame o the perran iron foundry an innovative concern run bi the fox family o falmouth an ither quaker business families

lines.value: the creek servin the factory siltit up an minin in cornwall declined

lines.value: the wharf haed been uised tae import timmer for the minin industry frae scandinavie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the slump in the minin industry durin the 1870s hit perran foondry badly an it closed in mairch 1879 wi the loss o 400 jobs causin great distress in the parish

lines.value: in aprile 1879 the royal cornwall gazette reportit that a soup kitchen haed been open syne januar 793 fowk haed attendit an 1240 quarts o soup wur distributit

lines.value: the buildings includin manor mill on the opposite side o the road wur later adaptit bi the edwards brothers for the millin an storage o grains an ainimal foods an an a cloth dyein anither waterwheel wis addit

lines.value: ower the past few years thare hae been ambitious plans which hae come an gane but little haes chynged at the foondry site apairt frae the gradual deterioration o the buildings

lines.value: the term mey be uised tae describe opposition tae organized religion or tae describe a broader opposition tae ony form o belief in the supernatural or the divine

lines.value: phitsanulok (, ) is an important an historic ceety in lawer northren thailand an is the caipital o phitsanulok province which stretches aw the wey tae the laotian border
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: phitsanulok is ane o the auldest ceeties in thailand foondit ower 600 years ago
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is probably best kent as the birthplace o keeng naresuan who freed the kintra frae burmese domination in the late 16t century an his brither an successor keeng ekathosarot sanpet iii
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as the cross road atween the northren an central regions o the kintra it haes lang been important baith for poleetical an strategic reasons an wis focht ower mony times in centuries past
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: phitsanulok wis the caipital o thailand for 25 years durin the reign o keeng boromma trailokanat o ayutthaya
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: locatit on the banks o the nan river the ceety wis oreeginally a sma khmer ootpost kent as sang kwae afore the khwae noi river chynged its course in the 11t century ad phitsanulok wis an a a provincial centre o the angkorian empire durin the angkorian period
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: phitsanulok is hame tae naresuan university an pibulsongkram rajabhat university as well as tae a major ryal thai airmy base
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: field marshal alan francis brooke 1st viscoont alanbrooke kg gcb om gcvo dso & bar 23 julie 1883 &ndash 17 juin 1963 wis a senior commander in the breetish airmy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis the chief o the imperial general staff durin the seicont warld war an wis promotit field marshal in 1944
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as chairman o the chiefs o staff committee brooke wis the foremaist military advisor tae prime meenister winston churchill an in the role o co ordinator o the breetish military efforts wis an important but no aaways well kent contributor tae the allies victory in 1945
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter reteerin frae the airmy he served as lord hie constable o ingland durin the coronation o queen elizabeth ii in 1953
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his war diaries attractit attention for thair criticism o churchill an for brooke's fortricht views on ither leadin figures o the war
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: chuy province or chui province kyrgyz yyn obnactы ) is the northrenmaist province oblast o the kyrgyz republic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is bundit on the north bi kazakhstan an clockwise issyk kul province naryn province jalal abad province an talas province
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: its admeenistrative centre is bishkek but frae 2003 tae mey 2006 it wis tokmok

lines.value: the main northwast pairt o the province is flat a rarity in kyrgyzstan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this is the valley o the chu river
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the valley's black soil is vera fertile an is lairgely irrigatit wi watter divertit frae the chu river
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: agricultural production includes wheat maize succar beets potatoes lucerne an various vegetables an fruits

lines.value: durin the soviet period various agro processin an ither industries wur established throughoot the province givin rise tae a nummer o urban centers sic as tokmok kant an kara balta
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the population is considerably mair heterogeneous than that o the ither regions o the kintra wi mony ethnic roushies ukrainians dungans koreans germans etc.the kyrgyz ala too muntains form soothren mairch o the province an the northren mairch o talas province

lines.value: thare are mony hikin an trekkin routes accessible frae the touns in the valley

lines.value: the northeast panhandle is the chong kemin valley

lines.value: the main east wast transportation axis o the province is the taraz bishkek balykchy hieway runnin throu maist major ceeties o the province

lines.value: this road's section wast o bishkek is pairt o european route e40 kent locally as hieway m 39 based on the auld ussr hieway numberin scheme

lines.value: spain ( ), offeecially the kinrick o spain (), is a kintra maistly locatit on the iberian peninsula in europe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the kintra's mainland is mairchit tae the sooth an east bi the mediterranean sea except for a smaw laund boondary wi gibraltar tae the north an northeast bi fraunce andorrae an the bay o biscay an tae the wast an northwest bi portugal an the atlantic ocean
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: spaingie territory includes twa large airchipelagaes the balearic islands in the mediterranean sea an the canary islands aff the african atlantic coast twa ceeties ceuta an melilla on the african mainland an several smaw islands in the alboran sea near the african coast
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: spain is the anerly european kintra tae hae a mairch wi an african kintra morocco wi an aurie o spain is the lairgest kintra in soothren europe the seicont lairgest kintra in wastren europe an the european union an the fowert lairgest kintra in the european continent
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bi population spain is the saxt lairgest in europe an the fift in the european union
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: spain's caipital an lairgest ceety is madrid ither major urban auries include barcelona valencia seville bilbao an malaga
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: modren humans first arrived in the iberian peninsula aroond 35000 years ago
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: iberian culturs alang wi auncient phoenicie greek an carthaginian settlements developit on the peninsula till it cam unner roman rule aroond 200 bce efter that the region wis named hispania based on the earlier phoenician name sp(a)n or spania
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the end o the wastren roman empire the germanic tribal confederations migratit frae central europe invadit the iberian peninsula an established relatively independent realms in its wastren provinces includin the sueves alans an vandals
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: eventually the visigoths wad forcibly integrate aw remeenin independent territories in the peninsula includin byzantine provinces intae the kinrick o toledo that mair or less unifee'd poleetically ecclesiastically an legally aw the umwhile roman provinces or successor kinricks o that wis then documentit as hispanie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the late aicht century the visigothic kinrick fell tae the moors that ruled maist o the peninsula for the next seiven centuries leavin anerly a haundful o smaw christian realms in the north
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein the moorish conquest europeans begoud a gradual process o retakkin the region kent as the reconquista that bi the late 15t century culminatit in the emergence o spain as a unifee'd kintra unner the catholic monarchs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the early modren period spain becam ane o history's first global empires leavin a vast cultural an lingueestic legacy that includes ower 500 million hispanophones makkin spaingie the warld's seicont maist spoken native leid efter mandarin cheenese
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: spain is a secular pairlamentar democracy an constitutional monarchy wi keeng felipe vi as heid o state
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is a major developit kintra wi the warld's fowerteent lairgest economy bi nominal gdp an saxteent lairgest bi purchasin pouer parity

lines.value: sir walter scott 1st baronest 15t august 1771 21st september 1832 wis a kenspeckle scots historical novellist an makar that wis gey popular oothrou europe in his time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in some weys scott wis the first inglis language writer tae hae a truly internaitional career in his lifetime wi mony contemporar readers aw ower europe australie an north americae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his novelles an musardry is still read the day an mony o his warks bides clessics o baith inglis leid leeteratur an scots leeteratur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: weel kent warks o his includes ivanhoe rob roy marmion waverley an the heart of midlothian
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: born in colledge wynd in the auld toun o edinburgh in 1771 the son o a soleeciter the young walter scott won throu a bairnheid bout o polio in 1773 that left him a lamiter aw his days
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tae hulp wi his lameness he wis sent thon year tae bide in the landwart mairches at his grandpaurents ferm at saundyknowe no faur frae the rauchle o smailholm touer the umwhile faimily hame
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: here he wis leared tae read by his aunt jenny an learned frae the dialect on mony o the dytes an legends that chairacterized mony o his best kent warks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in januar 1775 he retoured tae edinburgh an thon simmer gaed wi his aunt jenny tae tak spa treatment at bath in ingland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the winter o 1776 he gaed back tae saundyknow wi crack at a watter cure bein made at prestonpans the follaein simmer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1778 scott retoured tae edinburgh for private eddication tae mak him ready for the schuil an in october 1779 he stairtit at the ryal hie schuil o edinburgh
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis weel able tae walk the nou an splore the ceety as weel as the landwart pairts aboot it
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his readin includit chivalric romances musradry history an vaigin beuks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis gien private tuition by james mitchell in arithmatic an writin an learned frae him the history o the kirk wi emphasis on the covenanters
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter feenishin schuil he wis sent tae bide for sax month wi his aunt jenny in kelsae gaein tae the local ott begoud studyin clessics at the varsity o edinburgh in november 1783 whan he wis juist twal year auld sae he wis a year or twa younger nor maist o the ithir scholars
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in mairch 1786 he begoud a prenticeship at his faither's office for tae become writer tae the signet
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while at the varsity scott becam a freend o aidam ferguson the son o professor aidam ferguson that hostit leeterar salons

lines.value: scott met wi the blind makar thomas blacklock that lent him beuks as weel as introducin him tae james macpherson's ossian cycle o poems
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin the winter o 1786-87 the fifteen year auld scott saw robert burns in ane o thir salons for whit wis tae be their ae meetin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whan burns noticed a prent illustratin the poem the justice of the peace an speired wha haed written the poem anely scott coud tell him it wis by john langhorne an wis thankit by burns
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whan it wis decidit that he wad become a lawer he retoured tae the varsity tae study law first takkin clesses in moral philosophy an universal history in 1789-90

lines.value: syne he set furth a three vollum set o scots ballants that he'd ingaithert the minstrelsy of the the scottish border

lines.value: this wis the first shaw o his intrest in scots history frae a leeterar staundpynt

lines.value: scott syne becam a gleg volunteer in the yeomanry an on ane o his raids he met wi margater charlotte charpentier or charpenter dochter o jean charpentier o lyon in fraunce that he wis mairiet on in 1797

lines.value: teodoro obiang nguema mbasogo born 5 juin 1942 is the preses o equatorial guinea haein served syne 1979
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: born intae the esangui clan in acoacan obiang jynt the military durin the colonial period an attendit the military academy in zaragoza spain
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he achieved the rank o lieutenant upon the election o francisco macias nguema
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: unner macias obiang held various jobs includin governor o bioko heid o the black beach prison an leader o the naitional guard
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he deposed francisco macias on 3 august 1979 in a bloody coup d'etat
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: macias wis placed on trial for his activities ower the previous decade an sentenced tae daith
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his activities heid includit the genocide o the bubi
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis executit on 29 september 1979 bi firin squad
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: obiang declared that the new government wad mak a fresh stairt frae the repressive measures taken bi macias admeenistration
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he inheritit a kintra wi an empty treasury an a population that haed dropt tae a third o its 1968 level wi aboot 50% o the umwhile 1.2 million indwallers haein moved aither tae spain or tae neighborin african kintras or bein murthert durin the dictatorship o obiang's predecessor
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he formally assumed the presidency in october 1979
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a new constitution wis adoptit in 1982 at the same time obiang wis electit tae a seiven year term as preses
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis reelectit in 1989 as the ae candidate
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter ither pairties wur permittit tae organize he wis reelectit in 1996 an 2002 wi 98 per cent o the vote in elections condemned as fraudulent bi internaitional observers
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: again in 2009 he wis electit wi 97% o the vote amid accusations o fraud an intimidation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: obiang's regime retained clear authoritarian characteristics even efter ither pairties wur legalized in 1991
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: maist domestic an interniational observers consider his regime tae be ane o the maist corrupt ethnocentric oppressive an undemocratic states in the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: equatorial guinea is nou essentially a single pairty state dominatit bi obiang's democratic pairty o equatorial guinea pdge
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 2008 american jurnalist peter maass cawed obiang africae's worst dictator worse than robert mugabe o zimbabwe

lines.value: he wis a witness tae the marriage o princess margaret an keeng eric ii o norawa 1280-99 whose dochter margaret the maid o norawa dee'd in 1290 on her voyage tae claim the throne o scotland throwin the kintra intae a great period o unrest

lines.value: in the 14t century durin the wars o scots unthirlrdom the clan mar led bi chief domhnall i earl o mar supportit keeng robert the bruce o scotland in fechtin the inglis

lines.value: he dee'd in 1302

lines.value: his son gartnait earl o mar teuk ower as chief but dee'd juist three years later in 1305

lines.value: gartnait's son domhnall ii earl o mar teuk ower as chief o the clan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis taken preesoner bi the inglis an ae released efter the battle o bannockburn in 1314

lines.value: he led the clan mar at the battle o dupplin moor against the inglis whaur he wis killed in 1332

lines.value: thomas 10t earl o mar dee'd athoot heir an the earldom passed tae his sister margaret coontess o mar an then tae her dochter isabel douglas coontess o mar isabel later marrit the wolf o badenonch alexander stuart

lines.value: a rather shady character who haed amaist certainly been involved in the daith o her first husband an who's wooin technique involved a prolanged siege

lines.value: isabel dee'd wi nae childer sae title passed back tae a descendant o domhnall i earl o mar the 7t earl o mar

lines.value: in the mid 15t century the earldom o mar passed tae the chief o clan erskine robert erskine 1st laird erskine de jure 12t earl o mar keeng james ii intervened in later successions an claimed the earldom for the croun throu alexander stewart an sae the earldom passed intae the stewart faimily
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this unlawful succession wis finally interruptit bi mary i queen o scots who saw that the richtful heir john erskine 17t earl o mar wis restored
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: chief john erskine 18t earl o mar wis govrenor o edinburgh castle an supportit keeng charles i mair bi default than throu ony great allegiance an haed his estates forfeitit till the restoration o charles ii for his son john erskine 19t earl o mar john laird erskine an earl o mar teuk up airms in the royalist cause

lines.value: the earl entertained james graham the 1st marquess o montrose in 1645 in his castle at alloa

lines.value: in antiquity somalie wis a important centre for commerce wi the rest o the auncient warld

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the auncient puntites war a naition o fowk that haed close relations wi pharaonic egyp durin the times o pharaoh sahure an queen hatshepsut
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the pyramidal structures temples an auncient hooses o dressed stane littered aroon the kintra are said tae date frae this period

lines.value: muhammad abdullah hassan's dervish state successfully repulsed the breetish empire fower times an forced it tae retreat tae the coastal region

lines.value: the turks an aa named hassan emir o the somali naition an the germans promised tae offeecially recognise ony territories the dervishes wur tae acquire

lines.value: nokia () is a toun an a municipality on the banks o the nokianvirta river kokemaenjoki in the region o pirkanmaa some 15 kilometres 9 mi wast o tampere
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as o 31 mairch 2010 it haes a population o 31517
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the oreegin o the name nokia is obscure
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in modren finnish noki means soot an nokia is its inflected plural although this form o the wird is rarely if iver uised
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the maist common theory claims the name actually oreeginates frae the archaic finnish wird nois pl nokia or nokinaata soot marten meanin sable
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter sable wis huntit tae extinction in finland the wird wis applied tae ony daurk coatit fur animal such as the marten which ar foond in the aurie tae this day
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the sable is enshrined on the nokia coat o airms
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: housomeivver later research haes appeared tae indicate that sables niver inhabitit finland in the first place an the name nois mey actually refer tae the beaver
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first literary reference to nokia is in a 1505 document in connection wi the nokia manor
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nokia wis the settin o ane o the lairgest battles in the club war a 1596 peasant uprisin against swadish feudal lords
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the peasants armed wi clubs teuk up residence in nokia manor an wan several skirmishes against the feudal cavalry but wur decisively defeatit bi klaus fleming on januar 1 2 1597
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thoosans o clubmen wur slain an their leader jaakko ilkka who haed fled wis captured a few weeks later an executit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the club war wis the last major peasant revolt in finland an it permanently consolidatit the hauld o the naition state
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: muckle later in the finnish ceevil war 1918 nokia alang wi neighborin tampere wis a socialist stranghauld an saw some combat
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nokia uised tae breach oot tae current hert o tampere wi the pispala aurie a pairt o nokia's suur pirkkala aurie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: suur pirkkala wis eventually split intae pohjois an etelais-pirkkala northren an soothren
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1938 pohjois pirkkala wis renamed as nokia an soothren pirkkala restored its oreeginal pirkkala name
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nokia wis designatit as a ceety in 1977
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the eponymous telecommunications giant nokia wis foondit bi fredrik idestam in 1865 as a pulp mill
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the finnish rubber works ltd suomen gummitehdas oy foondit 1898 set up a factory in nokia in 1904
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these twa companies an finnish cable works ltd suomen kaapelitehdas oy amalgamatit in 1967 formin nokia corporation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: different branches o this conglomerate wur split intae several companies or sauld aff aroond 1990
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the rubber wirks still operates in nokia as nokian tyres an the paper mill as georgia pacific finland oy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nouadays the telecommunication company nokia nae langer haes ony operations in the toun o nokia
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: despite the company haein been foondit in nokia the heidquarters wur moved tae espoo an the main factories ar in salo baith hunders o kilometres sooth o nokia
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: amaist ivery year tourists come tae nokia expecting tae find a great mobile phone museum but the anerlie connection tae the company is the nokia mansion which is sometimes uised for private parties for the company's executive staff
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun haes repeatedly been asked tae commemorate the company it gave birth tae but it haes always declined on the grunds that mobile phones wur niver produced there

lines.value: nokia does hae engineering an design facilities 15 kilometers away in nearbi tampere

lines.value: nokia an aa enjoys guid road an air connections

lines.value: the pontiac fiero wis a mid engined sports caur that wis biggit bi the pontiac division o general motors frae 1984 tae 1988

lines.value: optimism surroondit the caur till mairch 11t 2006 when airmed robbers raidit the factory o izuogu motors takin wi them the molds for the ingine blocks an crank shaft mudguards an ither components

lines.value: the naitional banner o indonesie which is kent as sang saka merah putih the sacred red and white or bendera merah putih the red an white banner or simply merah putih the red an white in indonesian is based on the banner o the 13t century majapahit empire in east java
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the banner itsel wis introduced an hoistit in public at the indonesian unthrildom day ceremony on 17 august 1945
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the design o the banner haes remained the same iver syne
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the design o the banner is semple wi twa equal horizontal baunds red top an white bottom wi an oweraw ratio o 2:3
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the banner is seemilar tae the banner o poland an banner o singapore
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the banner is identical tae the banner o hesse a german state an banner o monaco excludin the ratio
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: red represents courage while white represents purity o intent

lines.value: the naval jack o indonesie is reserved for sole uise bi indonesian navy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it flies frae ivery active indonesian war ship mast
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the design o the jack is describit as nine alternatin stripes o reid an white

lines.value: it is nicknamed ular ular perang war pennant or litterally war snakes probably due tae the stripes design
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the naval jack dates tae the age majapahit empire

lines.value: the majapahit empire which wis renouned for its great maritime strength uised tae flee seemilar jacks on its vessels
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: its colors are derived frae the banner o the 13t century majapahit empire

lines.value: later thir colors wur revived bi students an then naitionalists in the early 20t century as an expression o naitionalism against the dutch

lines.value: the reid white banner wis flewn for the first time in java in 1928

lines.value: unner dutch rule the banner wis prohibitit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis adoptit as the naitional banner on 17 august 1945 when unthrildom wis declared an haes been in uise syne then

lines.value: thare is an aa anither story aboot the banner o indonesie which is significantly relatit tae the banner o the netherlands
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: unner dutch colonialism ivery admeenistration uised the netherlands red-white-blue banner
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the banner o indonesie wis prohibitit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tae seembolise the intention o forcin oot the dutch the indonesian naitionalists an umthirldom movement tore apart the dutch banner

lines.value: thay tore aff the bottom third o the banner an separatit the reid an white colors frae the blue colour

lines.value: the main reason wis acause blue in the dutch banner wis unnerstood as staunding for the blue bloodit aristocracy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: conversely the reid colour representit the bluid shed in the war o unthrildom while the white coud be unnerstood tae seembolise the purity o the indonesians

lines.value: the offeecial name o the banner is sang merah putih the reid an white accordin tae airticle 35 o the 1945 constitution

lines.value: the banner is commonly cawed bendera merah putih red-an-white banner

lines.value: occasionally it is an aa cawed sang dwiwarna the bicolor

lines.value: sang saka merah putih the lofty reid an white refers tae the historical banner cawed bendera pusaka heirloom banner an its replica

lines.value: inarguably till the day baith o thir are the major components o daily indonesian cuisine or cookin

lines.value: yellow is for the sun which gies licht an life red seembolises the fowk an thair determination tae wirk for the future in unity an love whilst the white baund represents social juistice an harmony

lines.value: wilhelm richard wagner 22 mey 1813 in leipzig - 13 februar 1883 in venice wis an gey moyen german componer muisic theorist an essayist maistlie kent for his grundbrakking symphonic operas or music dramas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his warks is byordinar for thair conteenuous contrapuntal textur rich harmonies an orchestration an elaborate uiss o leitmotifs themes pitten thegither wi parteeclar chairacters or seetiations
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wagner's chromatic muisical leid wis lik later oncomes in european classical muisic includin unco chromaticism an atonality
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: naitural philosophy or pheesics frae the greek (), naitural an (), naitur is a science o naitur in the braidest furm

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: pheesicists studies a braid reenge o pheesical phenomenae frae the sub nuclear pairticles that maks up aw ordinar maiter pairticle pheesics tae the maiteral universe as a hail cosmologie

lines.value: pheesics is the natural science at involves the study ay matter and its motion ben space and time alang wi related concepts sic as energy and force
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mair broadly it is the general analysis ay nature conducted in order tae kin hoo the universe behaves
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is a body ay the oldest academic disciplines aiblins the oldest ben its inclusion ay astronomy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ower the lest tois millennia pheesics was a part ay naitural philosophy alang wi chemistry certain branches ay mathematics and biology but durin the scientific revolution in the 17th century the naitural sciences emerged as unique research programs in their ain reit

lines.value: pheesics intersects wi mony interdisciplinary areas ay research such as biopheesics and quantum chemistry and the boondaries ay pheesics arenae rigidly defined
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: new ideas in pheesics aft explain the fundamental mechanisms ay other sciences while openin new avenues ay research in areas sic as mathematics and philosophy

lines.value: fowk metal is a kynd o metal muisic that taks elements o fowk muisic an jynes it thegither wi metal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mair or less ony baund that jynes fowk muisic wi some kynd o metal is cried fowk metal the metal is ordinar black metal pouer metal or deid metal tho ithir kynds is uised forby
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: fowk metal bands aften soond gey different frae ilk ither for twa main raisons
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: first they are commin frae different fowk muisic tradeetions sae a fowk metal baund frae finland is gaun tae soond different tae ane frae the faroe islands ) an sae the fowk elements will be disteenctive tae ilka kintra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: seicond they are commin frae different kynds o metal sae a fowk metal baund that haes strang deid metal influence winna soond the same as ane that haes strang pouer metal influence e'en gin they draw frae the same fowk tradeetion e.g german
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the reenge o metal genres taen intil fowk metal is gey braid some baunds draws frae ae kynd of metal e.g elvenking taks pouer metal for ordinar or windir uises anerly black metal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ither baunds jynes thegither different kynds o metal e.g turisas jynes pouer metal a tait black metal etc.syne maist fowk metal baunds is frae europe the maist ordinar fowk tradeetions uised bi thaim is european

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: essentially baunds taks the fowk muisic tradeetions frae their ain kintra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this haes led tae labels sic as celtic metal it shoud be taen tae mynd that baunds that cries thaimsels pagan metal celtic metal north american metal etc is for ordinar fowk metal

lines.value: fowk metal baunds isna anerly diferent in their wale o kynds o metal an fowk but in the wey that they jyne the twa thegither an aw

lines.value: for example fowk melodies can be played on a fowk instrument sic as a kantele or on the electric guitar or baith

lines.value: at the same time baunds whiles taks sangs frae ither genres an chyngee thaim intae a fowk metal style e.g turisas haed a kiver o those were the days on ane o their early demos an aften kiver boney m's rasputin live

lines.value: wild haggis haggis scoticus is a fictiounal baste said tae be native tae the scots hielands
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is comically claimed tae be the source o haggis a tradeetional scots dish that is in fact graithit fae the emmlins o sheep includin hert lichts an lever
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: according tae some sources the wild haggis left legs are o different length than its richt legs cf
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the sidehill gouger allowing it tae run quickly aroond the steep mountains and hillsides which make up its natural habitat but only in yin direction
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is further claimed that there are two varieties of haggis one with longer left legs and the ither with longer right legs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the umwhile variety can run deasil roun a mountain seen fae aboun while the latter can rin withershins
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the two varieties coexist peacefully but are unable to interbreed in the wild because in order for the male of one variety to mate with a female of the ither he must turn to face in the same direction as his intended mate causing him to lose his balance afore he can mount her
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a result of this difficulty differences in leg length among the haggis population are accentuated

lines.value: the notion o the wild haggis is widely believed tho no ayeweys includin the thocht o maikless legs

lines.value: straidlin the white cart watter that gangs the gither wi the black cart watter an becomes the river cart nor'warts the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the dounset occupees the lawland tae the north o the gleniffer braes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley wis ance thocht tae hae been the steid o the roman fortification o vanduara or vandogara chronicelt bi ptolemy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the identifeecation o the steid o modren paisley wi this fort is foremaist foondit on the sibness o the name o the station tae the brythonic gwen dwr white watter that wis mynt tae hae been the name o the white cart watter at thon time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the 12t century a priory wis foondit at paisley that a dounset suin grew aroond
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: athin a hunner yeir o its foondation the priory haed managed at gittin the status o a abbey
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun became famous in the 18t and 19t centuries for the production o claith inspecially cotton wi the distinctive paisley pattern
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: <!needs pittin ower intae scots paisley is the seicont largest toun in scotland after east kilbride with a population o 72970
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whilst smaller than scotland's major cities glasgow edinburgh aberdeen and dundee it forms the sixth largest settlement in the country haein a greater population than inverness or stirling which both have city status
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley forms much o the south wastern part o the greater glasgow conurbation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: formerly known as paislay the burgh's name is o uncertain origin some sources suggest a derivation either from the brythonic word pasgill pasture or more likely passeleg basilica i.e major kirk itself derived from the greek basilika
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: however some scottish place name books suggest passa's wood clearing from the old english personal name passa and leah clearing wood
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: pasilege 1182 and paslie 1214 are recorded previous spellings o the name
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley has monastic origins
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a chapel is said to have been established by the 6th/7th century irish monk saint mirin at a site near a waterfall on the white cart water known as the hammils
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: though paisley lacks contemporary documentation it may have been along with glasgow and govan a major religious centre o the kingdom o strathclyde
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a priory was established in 1163 from the cluniac priory at wenlock in shropshire england at the behest o walter fitzalan d
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: 1177 high steward o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1245 this was raised to the status o an abbey
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the restored abbey and adjacent place palace constructed out o part o the medieval claustral buildings survive as a [[kirk o scotland]] parish kirk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: one o scotland's major religious houses paisley abbey was much favoured by the bruce and stewart royal families
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is generally accepted that william wallace the great hero o scottish independence who inspired the film braveheart was educated here
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: king robert iii 1390-1406 was buried in the abbey
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his tomb has not survived but that o princess marjorie bruce 1296-1316 ancestress o the stewarts is one o scotland's few royal monuments to survive the reformation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley coalesced under james ii's wish that the lands should become a single regality and as a result markets trading and commerce began to flourish
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1488 the toun's status was raised by james iv to burgh o barony
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: many trades sprang up and the first school was established in 1577 by the toun council
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: by the mid nineteenth century weaving had become the toun's principal industry
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley is still very well known for the paisley shawl and its distinctive paisley pattern which originated around this time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: through its weaving fraternity paisley gained notoriety as being a literate and somewhat radical toun although it could be argued in a fiercely positive direction
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: by this time there was a real mixture o religious opinions and healthy drink fuelled debate raged at night amongst the weavers poets merchants masons and others
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the poet robert tannahill lived in this setting working as a weaver
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the weavers o paisley were also active in the radical war o 1820
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley was at one time famous for its weaving industry
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: for nearly a hundred years until the 1870s shawls o the paisley pattern were in fashion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: until the jacquard loom was introduced in the 1820s weaving was a cottage industry
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this innovation led to the industrialisation o the process
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a result many weavers lost their livelihoods and left for canadae and australie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: one o these a man named john hart and a paisley mill owner settled at perth ontario where he had a book store and mercantile troke
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: due to its ure mild climate paisley was for many years a centre for the manufacture o cotton sewing thread
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the heyday o paisley thread manufacture in the 1930s there were 28000 fowk employed in the huge anchor and ferguslie mills o j & p coats ltd ( coats viyella said to be the largest o their kind in the world at that time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the 1950s the mills diversified into the production o synthetic threads but with cheap foreign imports and the establishment by coats o mills in indie and brazeel the writing was on the wall for paisley and production began to diminish rapidly
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: by the end o the 1980s there was no thread being produced in paisley
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: however both industries have left a permanent mark on the toun in the form o the many places with textile related names for example dyer's wynd cotton street thread street shuttle street lawn street silk street mill street and incle street
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun also supported a number o engineering works some o which relied on the textile industry others on shipbuilding
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: with the demise o both these industries in the wast o scotland the engineering works too have all but gone
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the mid 1970s industry in paisley went into rapid decline
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the preserve manufacturer robertsons which was founded in paisley in the 1860s closed its stevenson street factory and transferred production to bristol manchester and london
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this closure was followed by those o the engineering firms o fullerton hodgart and barclay and whites engineering
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1981 the area was dealt a massive blow when peugeot talbot formerly chrysler and before that rootes announced that their linwood factory just outside o paisley would cease production
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: almost 5000 workers were laid of
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the knock on effect on other trokees in the area was immeasurable and despite numerous regeneration projects linwood has never recovered
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: brown and polson commenced producing starch and cornflour in paisley in the 1860s
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it later became cpc foods ltd a subsidiary o unilever which produced hellmann's mayonnaise gerber baby foods and knorr soups
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the company ceased production in paisley in 2002
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: other trokees to have closed since the 1990s are the scottish gas distribution and service centre cadbury's distribution centre and william grant & sons the scotch whisky producer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: some o the remaining employers in the toun are scotch whisky blenders and bottlers chivas brothers now a subsidiary o pernod ricard and the pigment manufacturers o the swiss company ciba geigy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: both companies employ considerably fewer fowk than in the past
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: glasgow international airport which is situated to the north o paisley is a major centre o employment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: many paisley fowk travel outside o the toun to work most notably to glasgow city centre
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley's good transport links enable many residents to work throuout the clyde valley region
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the 1960s the toun centre underwent considerable redevelopment resulting in the demolition o the county buildings in county square and the adjacent police station and toun gaol
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these fine victorian edifices were replaced by the brutalist concrete gilmour house and the piazza trokeping centre which spans the white cart water
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wast o paisley abbey provides an example o original gothic architecture dating to the 12th century
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the east end and tower date to the late 19th and early 20th centuries and are examples o gothic revival architecture
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley toun hall the george a clark toun hall was funded by clarks the owners o the anchor thread mill
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in response their main competitor in the production o thread in the toun sir peter coats funded the building o the equally magnificent paisley museum and library in 1871
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these and many other remarkably grand buildings in paisley testify to the power influence and success o the textile industry in the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the thomas coats memorial kirk is an example o gothic revival architecture
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it dominates the toun's skyline with its crown spire more than 60 metres high
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: opened in 1894 and designed by hippolyte jean blanc it is the largest baptist kirk in europe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the exterior is made o old red sandstone
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: inside the kirk is decorated with wood carvings mosaic floors and marble fonts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the kirk also contains a 3040 pipe hill organ
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the cathedral kirk o saint mirin st mirin's cathedral in incle street is the seat o the catholic bitroke o paisley
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the kirk was completed in 1931 to replace an earlier building in nearby east buchanan street which dated from 1808
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the original st mirin's kirk was the first catholic kirk to be built in scotland since the reformation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: with the erection o the diocese o paisley in 1947 the kirk was raised to cathedral status
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: st matthew's kirk [[kirk o the nazarene]] at the junction o gordon street and johnston street is art nouveau in style
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: designed by local architect william daniel mclennan a contemporary o charles rennie mackintosh it was built in 1906
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the russell institute was built in 1926
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the a listed anchor mill built 1886 was converted in 2005 into modern apartments
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the building is an example o successful redevelopment o old industrial areas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley civic centre designed by sir basil spence and partners was built in the 1960s to house the renfrewshire county ofices
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it was intended to become the civic hub for paisley but the absence o any trokes and non council premises prevented this from happening
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it became the home o the renfrew sub region o strathclyde regional council in 1975 and o renfrewshire council in 1996
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is listed by the conservation organisation docomomo as one o the sixty key scottish monuments o the post war period
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1992 paisley college o technology founded in 1896 as paisley central institution became the varsity o paisley which merged with bell college in hamilton on the 1st o august 2007
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the merged institution was then renamed as the varsity o the wast o scotland on the 30th o november 2007
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun also contains red kerr college which provides further education
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: there are four seicontary schools in paisley paisley grammar school castlehead high school st andrew's academy and gleniffer high school
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the oldest o these is paisley grammar which was founded in 1586
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: until the late 1990s there were five more seicontary schools now no longer in existence haein been the casualties o the reduction in pupil numbers merksworth high school to the north wast o the toun john neilson high school and st mirin's high school on the wast side o the toun st aelred's high school and stanely green high school both on the south side o the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: viewers in paisley can receive all the uk terrestrial channels and radio listeners can receive all the major uk stations plus a number o local services
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the local daily newspaper is the paisley daily express whose ofices are located on new street in the toun centre o paisley
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the locally based radio station q96 has gone of air and has been replaced with 96.3 rock radio
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: despite being based in baillieston glasgow the terms o the licence state that it must carry renfrewshire based material
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the piazza trokeping centre based in the heart o paisley has forged many links within the community and is the toun's busiest centre
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: featuring household names such as somerfield new look d2 and the carphone warehouse the piazza is also home to one o the top 50 post ofice branches in the uk one o two scottish flagship stores it was made a crown post ofice in 2007
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the piazza has also recently launched a student card providing a range o discounts for the thousands o students that pass throu paisley every year
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the paisley centre is a three floored centre including a department store an indoor market and over 50 trokeping units including marks and spencer boots superdrug vodafone thorntons the body troke and t mobile as well as many local outlets
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in recent years however the quality and variety o trokeping has declined with many o paisley's more affluent customers choosing to troke at the 1998 braehead trokeping centre which lies within renfrewshire's boundaries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: through this competition and high tax rates for local trokees many stores have been forced to close their doors
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: despite a poor perception however many retailers are still thriving in paisley's trokeping centres and adding colour to the toun is the variety o busy continental and farmers markets which oten take place in the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: st mirren fc the local paisley scottish premier league football team have been given planning permission to move to a new 8000 seat stadium from their home on the toun's love street to one located on greenhill road to help regenerate the deprived ferguslie park area
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: their last major success was on 16 may 1987 when st mirren won the scottish cup with thousands crowding the streets to see the team
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 2006 the team won the scottish football league first division and has returned to the scottish premier league
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they have a very active youth development system and are part o the social fabric o the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this was demonstrated when at a renfrewshire council planning committee board meeting on the new stadium and supermarket to replace love street came to be heard
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: with the initial recommendation that st mirren be denied permission for the supermarket but allowed the stadium something that threatened the future o the club due to the supermarket being only solution to clear its debts some 300 buddies stood outside the final meeting o renfrewshire council in cotton street on a dry tuesday morning in support
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the club was granted permission at this meeting with a majority vote o 9-5 in favour
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: abercorn fc were paisley's other proessional team but fell into decline and subsequent liquidation in 1920
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley is also the base for scotland's only proessional basketball team the scottish rocks and ice hockey team paisley pirates both o whom use the 5300 seat braehead arena for home games
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the rocks are one o the leading basketball teams in the united kingdom competing in the elite british basketball league
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the franchise relocated to renfrewshire from edinburgh in 2002 and have built up a loyal and passionate fanbase in the area since
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley also has two cricket grounds by the name o kelburne cricket club and ferguslie cricket club
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: both cricketers majid haq and omer hussain scottish internationalist cricketers have played for both kelburne and currently play for ferguslie cricket club
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in addition paisley is home to two rugby clubs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley rfc who play union and paisley hurricanes who play league
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: both are currently based at the anchor recreational grounds and run several teams and youth and senior level while also providing coaches to local schools
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley is also home to the kelburne hockey club who have dominated domestic hockey in the last 3 seasons
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kelburne hc run 5 gents teams 3 ladies teams and have over 100 juniors regularly competing for the club at district and national level
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kelburne hc has also supplies the scottish national team the vast majoirty o the gents team
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the club has also had success in europe with recent tournament victories in austria and switzerland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: motorcycle speedway was staged at st mirren park in 1975 and 1976 when the paisley lions raced in the seicont division o the british leagues
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the lions were moderately successful but despite the best efforts o their supporters the venue was lost to speedway
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: glasgow international airport's terminal buildings are located in the north o paisley at abbotsinch
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the airport authority and the many trokees located in around the airport are a major source o employment for paisley and touns nearby
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: paisley is connected to the uk motorway network with the m8 running along the northern edge o the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this forms part o the unsigned e5 euroroute from greenock to gibraltar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: many major a roads converge throu the toun including the a726 a737 and a761
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun is linked by rail to glasgow city centre as well as inverclyde and the ayrshire coast being served by four stations paisley gilmour street paisley st james paisley canal and hawkhead
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the rail links also connect to glasgow prestwick international airport and ferry routes to dunoon the isle o arran isle o bute and ireland.there are plans in place and royal assent has been given for a rail link from the inverclyde line to glasgow international airport planned for completion in 2009 with services starting in 2010
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: built in 1807 the glasgow & ardrossan canal ran from port eglinton in glasgow to paisley
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: despite initial plans the canal never reached ardrossan and it terminated at thorn brae in johnston
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: see glasgow paisley and johnstone canal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: after closure in 1885 the canal was de watered and formed the basis for the glasgow and south wastern railway company's paisley canal line connecting glasgow to paisley and onward to elderslie bridge o weir and greenock
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the seicont paisley canal railway station is operational
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bus routes connect to other nearby touns and glasgow city centre
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun benefits from some o the best transport links in the central belt o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: castlehead situated to the southwast o the centre o the toun is a wooded area o victorian villas where many o the toun's leading industrialists made their homes in the late 19th century
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is a conservation area
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: oakshaw situated on a hill to the north o the high st is a conservation area and home to many fine buildings including the high kirk the coats observatory and the former john neilson institute now converted into apartments
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thornly park is located to the south o the toun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the area is classed as a conservation area with many examples o various architecture ranging from mock tudor to art deco
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: many o the houses were designed by w d mclennan who also designed several local kirkes such as saint matthew's
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun is surrounded by several large residential areas that were created after the housing act o 1946
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these include glenburn south foxbar south wast ferguslie park north wast gallowhill north east and hunterhill south east
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ferguslie park was named by the scottish executive's most deprived area in 2006
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nearer the centre o the toun remains many areas o older housing
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the toun centre williamsburgh and charleston areas contain many examples o scottish tenement flats
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: three to four storeys tall with trokes on the ground floor and constructed o local blond and red sandstone
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these tenement flats have been extensively restored and modernised over the last two decades
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: gockston in the far north o the toun has many terraced houses and after regeneration has many detached and semi detached houses as well as several flats ralston a residential area in the far east o the toun which borders glasgow was outside the paisley burgh when constructed in the 1930's
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: following local authority reorganisation in the 1990's it is now generally regarded to be a suburb o paisley
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this follaed the daith o his free an bairnless cuisin queen elizabeth i o ingland the pokeshakkins o the ryal hoose o tudor

lines.value: the surname walkinshaw is a habitational name derived frae walkinshaw in renfrewshire

lines.value: osaka 大阪 osaka is a ceety in the kansai region o japan's main island o honshu the designatit ceety unner the local autonomy law the caipital ceety o osaka prefectur an an a the hert o greater osaka aurie

lines.value: their first album bathory wis released in 1984 an is regardit bi mony as the first black metal record the baund's fowert album blood fire death wis released in 1988 an includes twa early examples o viking metal - the sangs a fine day to die an blood fire death

lines.value: eduardo rivadavia o allmusic describes this as possibly the first true example o viking metal

lines.value: it wis follaeed in 1990 wi the release o hammerheart a landmark album that formally introduced tae the metal warld the archetypical viking metal album bi then the baund haed completely depairtit frae the satanic mould an wis squarely in viking meethology the viking metal muisic o bathory wis characterised bi wagnerian lengthy epics ostentatious arrangements chorused vocals an ambient keybuirds the year 1991 saw the formation of the norse group enslaved
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: their debut album vikingligr veldi arrived in 1994 wi mony melodies being borraeed frae ethnic scandinavian fowk muisic tae lend additional authenticity tae the vicious fast paced black metal inspired bi bathory enslaved set oot tae create viking metal devotit tae retellin norawa's legends an traditions o auld their seicont album frost an aa frae 1994 wis an important release for the extreme muisic subgenre o viking metal wi viking themes razor sharp guitars blastbeat drums an an ear for orchestration resultin in complex structures bountiful harmonies an time chynges enslaved haes syne been acclaimed as probably the foremaist exponents o the genre

lines.value: bi extension kyrgyz is an aa thocht tae mean unconquerable or undefeatable

lines.value: deng xiaoping 22 august 1904 19 februar 1997 wis a cheenese politeecian statesman theorist an diplomat
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as leader o the communist pairty o cheenae deng wis a reformer who led cheenae towards a market economy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while deng niver held office as the heid o state heid o government or general secretary o the communist pairty o cheenae historically the hiechest position in communist cheenae he nanetheless served as the paramount leader o the fowkrepublic o cheenae frae 1978 tae the early 1990s
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: born intae a peasant backgrund in guang'an sichuan cheenae deng studied an wirkt in fraunce in the 1920s whaur he came unner the influence o marxism
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he joined the communist pairty o cheenae in 1923
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: upon his return tae cheenae he wirkt as a political commissar in rural regions an wis considered a revolutionary veteran o the long mairch
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein the foondin o the fowkrepublic o cheenae in 1949 deng wirkt in tibet an ither soothwastren regions tae consolidate communist control
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis an aa instrumental in cheenae's economic reconstruction follaein the great leap forward in the early 1960s
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his economic policies wur at odds wi the political ideologies o chairman mao zedong
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a result he wis purged twice durin the cultural revolution but regained prominence in 1978 bi ootmaneuverin mao's chosen successor hua guofeng
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: inheriting a kintra wrought wi social an institutional woes resultin frae the cultural revolution an ither mass political movements o the mao era deng became the core o the seicont generation o cheenese leadership
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he is considered the architect o a new brand o socialist thinkin haein developed socialism wi cheenese characteristics an led chinese economic reform through a synthesis o theories that became kent as the socialist market economy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: deng opened cheenae tae foreign investment the global market an limitit private competition
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he is generally creditit wi advancin cheenae intae ane o the fastest growin economies in the warld for ower thirtie years an raisin the staundart o livin o hunders o millions o cheenese
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they ar kent for their twin guitar solos speed an epic vocals an leerics

lines.value: dragonforce wis stairtit in 1999 bi guitarists herman li an sam totman that played thegithir in a black metal baund cried demoniac an some ither extreme metal baunds unner the name dragonheart
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter recruitin singer zp theart as weel as ither muisickers tae complete the baund they pit oot a five sang demo cried valley of the damned in 2000 that wis at the tap o mp3.com's pouer metal chairt for mair nor twa year wi the title sang bein dounlaid mair nor hauf a million times in the first few month

lines.value: shortl syne twa o the oreegional members steve williams an steve scott quat the baund tae form anither pouer metal act cried power quest

lines.value: efter the demo wis released the baund haed tae chynge their name tae dragonforce syne there wis awready a baund cried dragonheart frae brazil

lines.value: the success o the demo managed tae win the baund a slot supportin rob halford on ane his uk tours

lines.value: efter being pickit up bi sanctuary records they pit oot their debut album valley of the damned in 2003 tae a wheen o creetical aclaim

lines.value: tourin awmaist wioot stoppin in support o baunds sic as helloween an wasp as weel as heidlinin their ain shaws they teuk the album roond the warld an won ower a legion o new fans

lines.value: their 2004 album sonic firestorm came wi a deeferant line up as adrian lambert jynt on bass for tae replace diccon harper an dave mackintosh wis taen on as drummer for tae replace didier almouzni
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the album haed mair better production nor valley of the damned an saw the baund growe in popularity ance mair as they toured the warld in support o the new record wi support frae angra an mendeed
