lines.value: cleopatra vii philopator in greek kaeonatpa φiaonatwp late 69 bc - august 12 30 bc kent tae history as cleopatra wis last the pharaoh o auncient egyp
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she wis a member o the ptolemaic dynasty o ancient egyp an therefore wis a descendant o ane o alexander the great's generals who haed seisit control ower egyp efter alexander's daith
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: maist ptolemeis spoke greek an refused tae learn egyptian which is the raison that greek as well as egyptian leids wur uised on offeecial court documents lik the rosetta stane
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bi contrast cleopatra learned egyptian an representit hersel as the reincarnation o an egyptian goddess
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cleopatra oreeginally ruled jointly wi her faither ptolemy xii auletes an later wi her brithers ptolemy xiii an ptolemy xiv whom she marriet as per egyptian custom but eventually she became sole ruler
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as pharaoh she consummatit a liaison wi gaius julius caesar that solidified her grip on the throne
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she later elevatit her son wi caesar caesarion tae co ruler in name
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter caesar's assassination in 44 bc she aligned wi mark antony in opposition tae caesar's legal heir gaius iulius caesar octavianus later kent as augustus
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi antony she bore the twins cleopatra selene ii an alexander helios an anither son ptolemy philadelphus
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: her unions wi her brithers produced nae childer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter losin the battle o actium tae octavian's forces antony committit suicide
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cleopatra follaed suit accordin tae tradeetion killin hersel bi means o an asp bite on 12 august 30 bc she wis briefly ootlived bi caesarion who wis declared pharaoh but he wis suin killed on octavian's orders
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: egyp became the roman province o aegyptus
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tho cleopatra bore the auncient egyptian title o pharaoh the ptolemaic dynasty wis hellenistic haein been foundit 300 years afore bi ptolemy i soter a macedonian greek general o alexander the great
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as sic cleopatra's leid wis the greek spoken bi the hellenic aristocracy tho she wis reputit tae be the first ruler o the dynasty tae learn egyptian
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she an a adoptit common egyptian beliefs an deities
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: her patron deity wis isis an sicweys durin her reign it wis believed that she wis the reincarnation an embodiment o the goddess
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: her daith merked the end o the ptolemaic kinrick an hellenistic period an the beginnin o the roman era in the eastren mediterranean
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tae this day cleopatra remains a popular figure in wastren cultur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: her legacy survives in numerous wirks o airt an the mony dramatizations o her story in literature an ither media includin william shakespeare's tragedy antony and cleopatra jules massenet's opera cleopatre an the 1963 film cleopatra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in maist depictions cleopatra is put forward as a great beauty an her successive conquests o the warld's maist pouerful men ar taken tae be proof o her aesthetic an sexual appeal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in his pensees philosopher blaise pascal contends that cleopatra's classically bonnie profile changed warld history cleopatra's nose haed it been shorter the whole face o the warld woud hae been chyngit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the identity of cleopatra's mither is unkent but she is generally believed tae be cleopatra v tryphaena of egypt the sister or cousin and wife of ptolemy xii or possibly anither ptolemaic faimily member who wis the daughter of ptolemy x and cleopatra berenice iii philopator if cleopatra v wis nae the daughter of ptolemy x an berenice iii
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cleopatra's faither auletes wis a direct descendant of alexander the great's general ptolemy i soter son of arsinoe and lacus baith of macedon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: centralization o pouer an corruption led the uprisings in an the losses of cyprus and cyrenaica makin ptolemy's reign the end o the maist calamitous o the dynasty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: when ptolemy went tae roum wi cleopatra cleopatra vi tryphaena seized the croun but died shortly afterwards in suspicious circumstances
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is believed tho nae proven bi historical soorces that berenice iv pushiont her sae she coud acome the sole ruler
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: regairdless o the cause she did till ptolemy auletes returned in 55 bc wi roman support capturing alexandria aided bi roman general aulus gabinius
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: berenice wis imprisoned and executit shortly efterwards her aid allegedly bein sent tae the royal court on the decree of her faither the keeng
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cleopatra wis nou at age 14 put as jynt regent and deputy tae her faither awtho her power wis likely tae hae been severely leemitit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ptolemy xii died on mairch 51 bc sicweys bi his will makin the 18-year-auld cleopatra and her brither the 10-year-auld ptolemy xiii jynt monarchs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first three years of thair reign war difficult due tae economic difficulties faimin deficient floods o the nile and poleetical conflicts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho cleopatra wis mairit tae her young brither she quickly made it clear that she haed no intention of sharin power with0 him
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in august 51 bc relations atween cleopatra and ptolemy completely broke doun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cleopatra dropped ptolemy's name frae offeecial documents and her face appeared alone on coins which went against ptolemaic tradeetion of female rulers bein subordinate tae male co rulers
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 50 bc cleopatra came intae a serious conflict wi the gabiniani powerful roman troops of aulus gabinius who haed left them in egypt tae pertect ptolemy xii efter his restoration tae the throne in 55 bc this conflict wis ane o the main causes of cleopatra's faw frae power shortly afterward
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the sole reign of cleopatra wis finally ended bi a cabal of courtiers lead bi the eunuch pothinus removing cleopatra frae power and makin ptolemy sole ruler in circa 48 bc or possibly earlier as a decree exists frae 51 bc wi ptolemy's name alone
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she tried tae stairt a rebellion aroond pelusium but she wis suin forced tae flee wi her anly remainin sister arsinoe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while cleopatra wis in exile pompey became embroiled in the roman ceevil war
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the hairst o 48 bc pompey fled frae the forces o caesar tae alexandria seekin sanctuary
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ptolemy anerlie thirteen years auld at that time haed set up a throne for hissel on the harbour frae whaur he watcht as on september 28 48 bc pompey wis murthert bi ane o his umwhile officers nou in ptolemaic service
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis beheidit in front o his wife an childer who wur on the ship frae which he haed juist disembarked
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ptolemy is thocht tae hae ordered the daith tae ingratiate hissel wi caesar sicweys becomin an ally o roum tae which egyp wis in debt at the time tho this act proved a miscalculation on ptolemy's pairt
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: when caesar arrived in egyp twa days later ptolemy presentit him wi pompey's severed heid caesar wis enraged
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho he wis caesar's poleetical enemy pompey wis a roman consul an the widower o caesar's anerlie legitimate dochter julia who dee'd in childbirth wi pompey's son
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: caesar seized the egyptian caipital an imposed hissel as airbiter atween the rival claims o ptolemy an cleopatra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: eager tae tak advantage o julius caesar's anger toward ptolemy cleopatra haed hersel smuggled secretly intae the palace tae meet wi caesar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane legend claims she entered past ptolemy's guards rolled up in a cairpet
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she became caesar's mistress an nine months efter thair first meetin in 47 bc cleopatra gae birth tae thair son ptolemy caesar nicknamed caesarion which means little caesar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at this pynt caesar abandoned his plans tae annex egyp instead backin cleopatra's claim tae the throne
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter a war lastin sax months atween the pairty o ptolemy xiii an the roman airmy o caesar ptolemy xiii wis drouned in the nile an caesar restored cleopatra tae her throne wi anither younger brither ptolemy xiv as her new co ruler
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho cleopatra wis 21 years auld whan thay met an caesar wis 52 thay became lovers durin caesar's stay in egyp atween 48 bc an 47 bc cleopatra claimed caesar wis the faither o her son an wished him tae name the boy his heir but caesar refused chuisin his grandnephew octavian instead
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin this relationship it wis an aa rumored that cleopatra introduced caesar tae her astronomer sosigenes o alexandria who first proposed the idea o leap days an leap years
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cleopatra ptolemy xiv an caesarion visitit roum in simmer 46 bc whaur the egyptian queen residit in ane o caesar's kintra hooses
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the relationship atween cleopatra an caesar wis obvious tae the roman fowk an it wis a scandal acause the roman dictator wis awready marriet tae calpurnia pisonis
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: but caesar even erectit a gowden statue o cleopatra representit as isis in the temple o venus genetrix the meethical ancestress o caesar's faimily which wis situatit at the forum julium
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the roman orator cicero said in his preserved letters that he hatit the foreign queen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cleopatra an her entourage wur in roum whan caesar wis assassinatit on 15 mairch 44 bc she returned wi her relatives tae egyp
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: when ptolemy xiv dee'd - allegedly pushiont bi his aulder sister - cleopatra made caesarion her co regent an successor an gae him the epithets theos philopator philometor = faither an mitherlovin god
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the roman ceevil war atween the caesarian pairty led bi mark antony an octavian an the pairty o the assassins o caesar led bi marcus junius brutus an gaius cassius longinus cleopatra sidit wi the caesarian pairty acause o her past
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: brutus an cassius left italy an sailed tae the east o the roman empire whaur thay conquered lairge auries an established military bases
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the beginnin o 43 bc cleopatra formed an alliance wi the leader o the caesarian pairty in the east publius cornelius dolabella who recognised caesarion as her co ruler
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: but suin dolabella wis encircled in laodicea an committit suicide julie 43 bc
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cassius then wantit tae invade egyp tae seize the treasures o that kintra an tae punish the queen for her refusal tae send him supplies an her support for dolabella
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: egyp seemed an easy target acause the land did no hae strang land forces an thare wis faimin an an epidemic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cassius an aa wantit tae prevent cleopatra frae bringin reinforcements for antony an octavian
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: but he coud no execute an invasion o egyp acause at the end o 43 bc brutus summoned him back tae smyrna
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cassius tried tae blockade cleopatra's route tae the caesarians
lines.name: Scots
